trans-unit.source: Defines a design-time object that is used to build strongly-typed runtime grammars that conform to the [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/).
trans-unit.target: Define um objeto de tempo de design que é usado para criar gramáticas fortemente tipados em tempo de execução de acordo com o [especificação de gramática de reconhecimento de fala (SRGS) versão 1.0](http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/).

trans-unit.source: You can you construct an empty SrgsDocument instance and build a grammar by adding instances of classes that represent SRGS elements, such as <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>,<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode construir uma instância de SrgsDocument vazia e crie uma gramática adicionando instâncias de classes que representam elementos SRGS, como <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>,<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag>e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>

trans-unit.source: You can also construct an SrgsDocument instance from an existing SRGS-compliant XML grammar file, from an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, or from an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode construir uma instância de SrgsDocument de um arquivo de Gramática SRGS compatível com XML existente, de uma instância do <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, ou de uma instância de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>

trans-unit.source: After the SrgsDocument object is created, it can be loaded into a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object or compiled by <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarCompiler>, enabling it to be read by a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object.
trans-unit.target: Depois que o objeto SrgsDocument é criado, ele pode ser carregado em um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>do objeto ou compiladas por <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarCompiler>, habilitá-la ser lido por um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objeto.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarCompiler> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: See [Create Grammars Using SrgsGrammar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e4d9f96e-2241-4c39-b9e0-ac9ef4e9a906) in the [System Speech Programming Guide for .NET Framework 4.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/610116c7-3817-40ff-857b-5d41e8511043) for more information and examples.
trans-unit.target: Consulte [criar gramáticas usando SrgsGrammar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e4d9f96e-2241-4c39-b9e0-ac9ef4e9a906) no [guia de programação de fala de sistema para o .NET Framework 4.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/610116c7-3817-40ff-857b-5d41e8511043) para obter mais informações e exemplos.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates an empty <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instance.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor cria vazio <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>instância.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>

trans-unit.source: To build a grammar within an empty <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instance, add instances of classes that represent SRGS elements, such as <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>.
trans-unit.target: Para criar uma gramática em vazio <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>da instância, adicionar instâncias de classes que representam elementos SRGS, como <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> class from a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> classe um <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"></xref> object used to create the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"> </xref> objeto usado para criar o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: builder is .
trans-unit.target: builderis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> class and specifies an <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule"></xref> object to be the root rule of the grammar.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> classe e especifica um <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule"> </xref> objeto a ser a regra raiz da gramática.

trans-unit.source: This constructor adds the specified rule to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection> of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> object and sets it as the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Root%2A> rule for the grammar.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor adiciona a regra especificada para o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection>do <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>do objeto e define-o como o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Root%2A>regra da gramática.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Root%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_root rule" name="root rule" href=""></xref> in the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_root rule" name="root rule" href=""></xref> in the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: grammarRootRule is .
trans-unit.target: grammarRootRuleis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> class specifying the location of the XML document that is used to fill in the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> classe especificando o local do XML de documento que é usada para preencher o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: The location of the SRGS XML file.
trans-unit.target: O local do arquivo XML SRGS.

trans-unit.source: path is .
trans-unit.target: pathis .

trans-unit.source: path is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: pathé uma cadeia de caracteres vazia.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> class from an instance of <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> that references an XML-format grammar file.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> classe a partir de uma instância de <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>que faz referência a um arquivo de gramática de formato XML.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object that was created with the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> XML instance.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objeto que foi criado com o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> instância XML.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: srgsGrammar is .
trans-unit.target: srgsGrammaris .

trans-unit.source: Gets the assembly reference information for the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o conjunto de informações de referência para o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: The AssemblyReferences property returns a string collection containing a list of the assembly references.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade AssemblyReferences retorna uma coleção de cadeia de caracteres que contém uma lista de referências de assembly.

trans-unit.source: Gets the code-behind information for the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as informações por trás do código para o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: The CodeBehind property returns a string collection that contains a list of the code-behind documents.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de code-behind retorna uma coleção de cadeia de caracteres que contém uma lista dos documentos por trás do código.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the culture information for the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define as informações de cultura para o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Windows e a API Speech aceitar todos os códigos de país de idioma válidos.

trans-unit.source: To perform speech recognition using the language specified in the Culture property, a speech recognition engine that supports that language-country code must be installed.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o reconhecimento de fala usando o idioma especificado na propriedade de cultura, um mecanismo de reconhecimento de fala que dá suporte a esse código de país de idioma deve ser instalado.

trans-unit.source: The speech recognition engines that shipped with Microsoft Windows 7 work with the following language-country codes.
trans-unit.target: Os mecanismos de reconhecimento de fala fornecido com o Microsoft Windows 7 trabalhar com os seguintes códigos de país de idioma.

trans-unit.source: - en-GB.
trans-unit.target: -en-GB.

trans-unit.source: English (United Kingdom) - en-US.
trans-unit.target: Inglês (Reino Unido) - en-US.

trans-unit.source: English (United States) - de-DE.
trans-unit.target: Inglês (Estados Unidos) - de-DE.

trans-unit.source: German (Germany) - es-ES.
trans-unit.target: Alemão (Alemanha) - es-ES.

trans-unit.source: Spanish (Spain) - fr-FR.
trans-unit.target: Espanhol (Espanha) - fr-FR.

trans-unit.source: French (France) - ja-JP.
trans-unit.target: Francês (França) - ja-JP.

trans-unit.source: Japanese (Japan) - zh-CN.
trans-unit.target: Japonês (Japão) - zh-CN.

trans-unit.source: Chinese (China) - zh-TW.
trans-unit.target: Chinês (China) - zh-TW.

trans-unit.source: Chinese (Taiwan) Two-letter language codes such as "en", "fr", or "es" are also permitted.
trans-unit.target: Códigos de idioma chinês (Taiwan) de duas letras, como "en", "fr" ou "es" também são permitidos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that contains the current culture information for <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>objeto que contém as informações de cultura atual para <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref>.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The value being assigned to Culture is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: É o valor que está sendo atribuído à cultura <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value being assigned to Culture is <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture*>.
trans-unit.target: O valor que está sendo atribuído à cultura é <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture*>.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether line numbers should be added to inline scripts.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define se os números de linha devem ser adicionados ao embutido scripts.

trans-unit.source: The Debug property returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if line numbers should be added for debugging purposes; otherwise the property returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de depuração retorna <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se os números de linha devem ser adicionados para depuração; caso contrário, a propriedade retornará <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the related namespaces for the current <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os namespaces relacionados atual <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: The ImportNamespaces property returns a string collection that contains a list of the related namespaces in the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ImportNamespaces retorna uma coleção de cadeia de caracteres que contém uma lista dos namespaces relacionados a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the programming language used for inline code in the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a linguagem de programação usada para o código embutido no <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The Language property returns the programming language to which <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> is currently set.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de idioma retorna a linguagem de programação para o qual <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> está definido atualmente.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the mode for the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o modo para o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The Mode property returns a member of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarMode> that determines the type of input that the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> expects.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade Mode retorna um membro do <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarMode>que determina o tipo de entrada que o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>espera.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarMode>

trans-unit.source: The two possible values are `Voice` for speech input, and `Dtmf` for input of dual-tone multi-frequency (DTMF) tones that are commonly associated with a telephone.
trans-unit.target: Os dois valores possíveis são `Voice` para entrada de fala, e `Dtmf` para entrada de tons de multi-frequência de tom dual (DTMF) que são normalmente associadas com um telefone.

trans-unit.source: The recognition mode of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O modo de reconhecimento do <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the namespace of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o namespace a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The Namespace property returns the namespace for the current <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade Namespace retorna o namespace atual <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the phonetic alphabet of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o alfabeto fonético do <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Phonetic alphabets are composed of phones, which consist of letters, numbers or characters, sometimes in combination.
trans-unit.target: Letras do alfabeto fonético são compostas de telefones, que consistem em letras, números e caracteres, às vezes, em combinação.

trans-unit.source: Each phone describes a unique sound of speech.
trans-unit.target: Cada telefone descreve um som exclusivo de fala.

trans-unit.source: This is in contrast to the Latin alphabet, for which any letter may represent multiple spoken sounds.
trans-unit.target: Isso está em contraste com o alfabeto latino, para que qualquer letra pode representar vários sons faladas.

trans-unit.source: Consider the different pronunciations of the letter "c" in the words "candy" and "cease", or the different pronunciations of the letter combination "th" in the words "thing" and "those".
trans-unit.target: Considere a pronúncia diferente da letra "c" na "Cessação" e "balas" palavras ou a pronúncia diferente da combinação da letra "th" na coisa"palavras" e "as".

trans-unit.source: In System.Speech, you can use any of three phonetic alphabets to specify custom pronunciations: International Phone Alphabet (IPA), Universal Phone Set (UPS), or the SAPI phone set.
trans-unit.target: Em Speech, você pode usar qualquer um dos três letras do alfabeto fonético para especificar pronúncia personalizada: alfabeto de telefone internacional (IPA), conjunto de telefone Universal (UPS) ou o SAPI phone conjunto.

trans-unit.source: The specified phonetic alphabet determines which phone set will be used to define inline pronunciations for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken> objects.
trans-unit.target: Alfabeto fonético específico determina qual conjunto de telefone será usado para definir a pronúncia embutido para <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken>objetos.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken>

trans-unit.source: The phones specified in <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Pronunciation%2A> must match the phonetic alphabet specified in PhoneticAlphabet.
trans-unit.target: Os telefones especificados em <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Pronunciation%2A>deve coincidir com o alfabeto fonético especificado em PhoneticAlphabet.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Pronunciation%2A>

trans-unit.source: See [Lexicons and Phonetic Alphabets](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/435e3c6f-6834-4e5a-b0f6-c17b2275dc51) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Consulte [dicionários e letras do alfabeto fonético](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/435e3c6f-6834-4e5a-b0f6-c17b2275dc51) para obter mais informações.

trans-unit.source: Returns the phonetic alphabet that must be used to specify custom pronunciations in the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o alfabeto fonético que deve ser usado para especificar a pronúncia personalizada no <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the root rule of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a regra raiz do <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object must already be in the document's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection> before it can be set to the **root rule**.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>objeto já deve estar no documento de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection>antes que ele pode ser definido como o **regra raiz**.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>

trans-unit.source: You can also set the root rule for an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> object by using an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object as the argument to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode definir a regra raiz para um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>objeto usando um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>objeto como o argumento para o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>construtor.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>

trans-unit.source: Returns the rule that is designated as the root rule of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a regra que é designada como a regra raiz do <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of rules that are currently defined for the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de regras que são definidas no momento para o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: You can add <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> objects to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection> by using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection.Add%2A> method on the Rules property.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>objetos para o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection>usando o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection.Add%2A>método na propriedade de regras.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>

trans-unit.source: If you initialize an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> object and specify an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object as the argument, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> is automatically added to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection> for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Se você inicializar um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>objeto e especificar um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>objeto como argumento, o que <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>é adicionado automaticamente à <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection>para <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>

trans-unit.source: Returns the rules defined for the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna as regras definidas para o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the .NET scripting language for the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a linguagem .NET para o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_Script" name="Script" href=""></xref> property returns the current .NET scripting language for the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref uid="langword_csharp_Script" name="Script" href=""> </xref> propriedade retorna a linguagem de script .NET atual para o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set the Script property to null.
trans-unit.target: É feita uma tentativa de definir a propriedade de Script como nulo.

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set the Script property to an empty string.
trans-unit.target: É feita uma tentativa de definir a propriedade de Script para uma cadeia de caracteres vazia.

trans-unit.source: Writes the contents of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> object to an XML-format grammar file that conforms to the [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761).
trans-unit.target: Grava o conteúdo do <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> objeto para um arquivo de gramática de formato XML que está de acordo com o [especificação de gramática de reconhecimento de fala (SRGS) versão 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> that is used to write the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>que é usada para gravar o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> instância.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: srgsGrammar is .
trans-unit.target: srgsGrammaris .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the base URI of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o URI de base de <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: XmlBase property gets a value that is used to resolve relative URIs in a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> object.
trans-unit.target: Propriedade XmlBase obtém um valor que é usado para resolver os URIs relativos em um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>objeto.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>

trans-unit.source: Suppose the value for XmlBase is "http://www.contoso.com/" and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> contains a relative rule reference to another document, for example `SrgsRuleRef("ExternalGrammar.grxml")`.
trans-unit.target: Suponha que o valor para XmlBase é "http://www.contoso.com/" e o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>contém uma referência de regra relativo a outro documento, por exemplo `SrgsRuleRef("ExternalGrammar.grxml")`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>

trans-unit.source: This creates the following absolute path to the external document: `http://www.contoso.com/ExternalGrammar.grxml`.
trans-unit.target: Isso cria o seguinte caminho absoluto para o documento externo: `http://www.contoso.com/ExternalGrammar.grxml`.

trans-unit.source: The current base URI of <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O URI de base atual da <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref>.
